DOC.brief_summary: Background study : Undergoing IVF ICSI treatment emotional physical burden woman partner . Most stressful couple wait result treatment , period embryotransfer pregnancy test menstruation unsuccessful treatment . Symptoms anxiety depression identify couple waitingperiod embryotransfer . For waitingperiod short selfhelp copingintervention develop base stress theory Lazarus woman use home . Goal instrument stimulate copingstyle positive reappraisal . Research demonstrate use copingstyle positive impact health related circumstance .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective study : To investigate short copingintervention reduces anxiety patient undergo IVF ICSI treatment UMCU waitingperiod embryotransfer . Study design : In research randomise control trial ( RCT ) use three group . The choice three group base earlier research daily record keep ( DRK ) . The DRK daily measurement emotion , copingstyle physical complaint . Previous research DRK show increase anxiety . More research must do impact DRK . Group 1 : Positive Reappraisal Coping Intervention ( PRCI ) & DRK & questionnaire Group 2 : DRK & questionnaire Group 3 : Standard care & questionnaire Study population : Patients undergo IVF ICSI treatment UMCU . Intervention ( applicable ) : A selfhelp cop intervention Primary study parameters/outcome study : Anxiety Secondary study parameters/outcome study ( applicable ) : Risk emotional problem copingstyle depression vital pregnancy quality life Nature extent burden risk associate participation , benefit group relatedness ( applicable ) : Using cop intervention may reduce anxiety patient . The use instrument burden patient . The burden patient complete questionnaire , six week embryotransfer . Partners ask fill questionnaire three time .
DOC.criteria: Patient IVF/ICSI treatment Patient speak dutch language
